title: play button greyed out
body: with the new update (7.8) my play button is greyed out. I have tried restarting pc, updating windows, turning off udc, disconnecting internet with client open and reconnecting, running lol as admin and nothign is working.... any advice?

replies.body: Typically that play button will only turn gray whenever it notices an unstable or less than optimal network connection. Let's try running through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first to make sure the main problem doesn't lie there.
